Groups.Group: Internet Security Benchmarks + Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Level 1

Advanced.DetectScript:
#!/bin/bash RV=0 Reasons="There are duplicate UIDs:" Expected="No duplicate UIDs."
duplicate=$(/bin/cat /etc/passwd | /bin/cut -f3 -d":" | /bin/sort -n | /usr/bin/uniq -c | while read x ; do [ -z "${x}" ] && break set - $x if [ $1 -gt 1 ]; then echo "$2" fi done) duplicates=$(echo $duplicate|tr ' ' ',')
if [ -n "$duplicates" ];then RV=1 fi
if [ $RV -eq 1 ]; then echo $Reasons${duplicates}. >&1 echo $Expected >&2 fi exit $RV

Vulnerability.Title: Check for Duplicate UIDs
Vulnerability.Description: Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually. Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
